title: Mr Gimme
creator_credit: Learning Corporation of America, Dolores Danska and Peter Mark Schifter
brief_description: The story of a boy who has his heart set on drums but can’t afford to buy them. Tony’s determination to get his drums leads him into a “get rich quick” scheme selling greeting cards. The troubles he causes his family teach him a painful lesson as he realises he must take a steady job as a delivery boy and repay his debts.
